plot: Pablo has it everything in the life: health, money and love. Nevertheless, a necrosis in the hip is going to trigger the loss of everything what that thought had safe. He is going to try to recover his stability at all costs, perhaps but he is too late.
title: Perro flaco
plot_es: Pablo has it everything in the life: health, money and love. Nevertheless, a necrosis in the hip is going to trigger the loss of everything what that thought had safe. He is going to try to recover his stability at all costs, perhaps but he is too late.
plot_en: Pablo has it everything in the life: health, money and love. Nevertheless, a necrosis in the hip is going to trigger the loss of everything what that thought had safe. He is going to try to recover his stability at all costs, perhaps but he is too late.
